name: Mallqui
description: The Mallqui is a Medium undead creature characterized by its pale, ghostly form and grim presence, with an aura of necrotic energy surrounding it.
memorable: It has the ability to regenerate unless it takes radiant damage and can cause exhaustion to nearby foes.
goals: Typically seeks to weaken living creatures and dominate the battlefield through exhaustion and necrotic damage.
relations: It might serve under more powerful undead creatures or dark entities, drawing on their dark energies.
environment: Often found in desolate places, graveyards, or sites of ancient battles, where it can continue its existence in undeath.
strengths: Resistant to various forms of damage, immune to common conditions, and capable of regenerating hit points.
weaknesses: Highly vulnerable to radiant damage, especially when moving in or near water.
attacks: Uses Xeric Blast for necrotic damage and expels an aura that causes exhaustion to nearby creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration allows it to heal itself unless it takes radiant damage.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 14, enhancing its awareness in darkness.
skills: Proficient in Insight, allowing it to effectively gauge the mental state of foes.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage
Resistance to cold and lightning damage
Can drain moisture and cause exhaustion
Does not require air, food, or sleep
Can manipulate water through its spells
spellcasting: Can cast spells using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability, allowing for diverse battlefield control.
test_queries: cunning undead that regenerates unless damaged
medium undead with necrotic attacks and spells
monster that drains moisture causing exhaustion
mallqui vulnerabilities radiant damage and water
undead creature skilled in insight and spellcasting
